issues: Multi-column layout detected - may cause ATS parsing issues
Images/figures detected - content may not be parsed
recommendations: Convert to single-column layout for better ATS compatibility
Remove decorative images or replace with text descriptions

unified.error: min() arg is an empty sequence

recommendations: Start 100% more bullets with strong action verbs (led, developed, implemented, increased)

formatted.suggestion: Replace weak verbs with strong action verbs. Start bullet points with impactful verbs that demonstrate achievement.
formatted.example:
❌ 'Was responsible for managing team'
✅ 'Led 5-person team to deliver $2M project'

formatted.suggestion: Ensure your resume includes: phone, email, work experience with dates, education, and skills section.
formatted.example:
Contact: Name, Phone, Email, LinkedIn
Experience: Job Title, Company, Dates, 3-5 bullets

formatted.suggestion: Add clear section headers: Experience, Education, and Skills. This helps ATS identify and categorize your information.
formatted.example:
EXPERIENCE
Software Engineer, Company Name
• Bullet point 1
• Bullet point 2

formatted.suggestion: Keep bullets 15-25 words. Be specific and lead with outcomes. Avoid paragraphs in experience sections.
formatted.example: Ideal: 'Developed Python automation script reducing data processing time by 60%' (12 words)

formatted.suggestion: Use standard fonts (Arial, Calibri, Times New Roman). Avoid graphics, images, or unusual formatting.

recommendations: Low overall match. Consider targeting different roles or significantly updating your resume.
Add these keywords naturally: experience, business, skills, strong, complex
